workData.title: Barbershop POS System
workData.description: Co-developed a Barbershop POS System in a 2-person team using Java, Spring Boot, Thymeleaf, Bootstrap and MySQL. Implemented Git workflow with separate branches for Frontend and Backend integration.
workData.longDescription: A comprehensive Point of Sale (POS) system designed specifically for barbershop businesses. This capstone project was developed in collaboration with a teammate, implementing a full-stack solution that handles customer management, service booking, transaction processing, and reporting. The system features a clean, intuitive interface that allows barbershop staff to efficiently manage daily operations.
features: Git workflow with separate Frontend/Backend branches

workData.title: Minibox Barbershop Management
workData.description: Developed a custom offline management system using Laravel & MySQL to digitize daily transactions. Designed responsive UI using Bootstrap and successfully deployed to replace manual recording.
workData.longDescription: A custom-built offline management system developed for a local barbershop to digitize their daily operations. This freelance project replaced their manual paper-based recording system with a digital solution that tracks transactions, manages inventory, and generates business reports. The system is designed to work offline, making it reliable even without internet connectivity.

workData.title: Core Initiative Frontend
workData.description: Developed responsive web interfaces using Vue.js according to UI/UX designs. Implemented modern frontend best practices in a fintech-focused environment.
workData.longDescription: During a virtual internship at Rakamin Academy, I worked on frontend development for Core Initiative, a fintech-focused project. The role involved translating UI/UX designs into functional, responsive web interfaces using Vue.js. This experience provided hands-on exposure to professional frontend development workflows and modern best practices in a fintech environment.

workData.title: Web Design Interface Course
workData.description: Mentored 50+ students in Web Design Interface course. Assisted lecturer in evaluating assignments and debugging student code (HTML, CSS, SQL).
workData.longDescription: As a laboratory assistant at Mercubuana Yogyakarta University, I mentored over 50 students in the Web Design Interface course. This role involved guiding students through HTML, CSS, and basic SQL concepts, helping them debug their code, and assisting the lecturer in evaluating assignments. This teaching experience enhanced my communication skills and deepened my understanding of web fundamentals.
features: Mentored 50+ students in web design fundamentals

workData.title: Database Design & Programming
workData.description: Taught Database Design & Programming With SQL course using Oracle Database. Helped troubleshoot technical issues during lab sessions.
workData.longDescription: As a laboratory assistant for the Database Design & Programming with SQL course at UMBY, I taught students database concepts using Oracle Database. The role involved demonstrating SQL queries, explaining database design principles, and helping students troubleshoot technical issues during lab sessions. This experience strengthened my Oracle SQL skills and teaching abilities.
features: SQL query writing and optimization guidance

workData.title: PKKMB FTI UMBY 2024
workData.description: Led the Media and Information team for Faculty of Information Technology's orientation program. Responsible for documentation, live broadcasting, and visual identity of the event.
workData.longDescription: As the PDD (Penanggung Jawab Divisi) Chairman for Media and Information during PKKMB FTI UMBY 2024, I led a team responsible for all media-related aspects of the Faculty of Information Technology's new student orientation program. This included managing documentation, coordinating live broadcasts, designing visual identity elements, and ensuring consistent communication throughout the event.
features: Led Media and Information division team
Visual identity design for the event
